About

This blog is possible thanks to the work of a number of people who are as generous as they are clever:

  • Jekyll is the magic that generates the pages
  • The theme is a lightly modified version of Lanyon – which is built on top of Poole
  • We are hosting this blog on GitHub Pages
  • We might never have known about Jekyll if not for Barry Clark’s excellent article on Smashing Magazine
